name: places/ChIJq6qOLh5awokRg1_47nu8jOQ
formattedAddress: 22 Harrison St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 Harrison St, New York, NY 10013-2810, USA

originalText.text: This is by far the best language instruction I have ever received.  We signed our elementary-aged kids up for lessons with a Spanish instructor, and it has exceeded our wildest expectations.  Our teacher (Bea) is BRILLIANT with kids -- she immediately got to know our children, and figured out their likes and dislikes, and taught them using that information. For instance, my daughter is obsessed with dinosaurs, so all the lessons magically tapped into that (e.g., [in Spanish] what color is a dinosaur? blue? No! green! Yes! etc.)  My daughter felt like she was just talking dinos with her friend, and we're thrilled by the vocabulary and comfort she is developing in another language.  In addition, when covid required everything to shift online, we considered dropping lessons because it felt too hard for an 8 year old to pay attention over Zoom in a foreign language.  But Bea is so good with Zoom that our daughter loved it -- she looks forward to her lessons every week, and especially likes having a chance to draw on the ipad and sing along with songs.  These lessons are costly, but they are worth every penny.   Great school.
